remarks: A Dirichlet character takes values in the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
statement:
dchrmhm.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrelbas4.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
dchrzrh1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrzrh1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ZZ ) $.
dchrzrhcl $p |- ( ph -> ( X ` ( L ` A ) ) e. CC ) $.
